name: pricing-calculator
description: Usage-based pricing calculator with slider and tier breakdown
postMessage:
Import: import { PriceCalculator } from '@/components/pricing-calculator/price-calculator'
Usage: <PriceCalculator tiers={[{ upTo: 1000, pricePerUnit: 0, label: 'Free' }, { upTo: 10000, pricePerUnit: 0.01, label: 'Standard' }, { upTo: Infinity, pricePerUnit: 0.005, label: 'Volume' }]} unit="API calls" />
